name: NewsJunkie
0:
”Alexa, open news junkie.”
”Alexa, ask news junkie, to add TechCrunch to my custom feed.”
”Alexa, ask news junkie, to tell me the headlines from the source Hacker News”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: news junkie
des:
News Junkie allows you to stay on top of the latest headlines from 80+ news sources. But it's not just about that. Here's a list of things you can ask News Junkie to do:

"to list all sources"
"to list all categories"
"to list all sources under the category <Technology>(example) "
"to tell me the headlines from the source <TechCrunch> (example)" "to tell me the news brief from the source <TechCrunch> (Headline with description)"
"to add <TechCrunch> (to my custom feed) "
"to show my custom feed settings"
"to reset my custom feed"
"to play headlines from my custom feed"
 "to play news brief from my custom feed"+
"to play headlines related to category <category>"+
 "to play news brief related to category <category>"+
 "to play headlines related to query <i-phone> (example)"
 "to play news brief related to query <i-phone> (example)"

You can add multiple sources to your custom feed and access headlines from them with a single utterance. You can search news stories by source, categories or even topics!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
